Arvrtise That To Accept Bitcoin

Arvrtise

Arvrtise is a one stop shop for Web5 marketing with no middleman fees.Arvrtise marketing campaigns use digital ads that are airdropped to your verified wallet that allows you to re-sell the ad to your customers, fans or clients to unlock your services, products or access to your Arvrtise Discord channels.

Mission

Traditional advertising favors funded businesses. Arvrtise solved this problem with a donation-based marketing model that eliminates upfront fees for unfunded business that donate a service or product.

Live

Arvrtise Live on our in-house live streaming platform with a chat for Q&A scheduled and promoted as a show episode. Or DIY and live stream from your Arvrtise Discord branded channel. Create a live auction for your biz.

Solutions

Arvrtise accepts Bitcoin Love (L$VE, $RNT, HAI$, $CBO) Cash Money donations in exchange for our solutions. This trickle-up approach empowers the creators economy, allowing our A-Team to grow as one tribe that does live business.

Bitcoin Reddit

HAHZ.ARVRTISE

Named after the creator of Arvrtise, Wizard of Hahz, Hahz is a free, decentralized, Reddit-like platform that allows users to upvote and downvote with Bitcoin Zaps. No algorithms, No bots, No middleman in your business.

Bitcoin Linkedin

Arvrtise Discord

Subscribe as a tribe to create your branded Arvrtise Discord channel and establish a verified Love Cash Money holder role to let everyone know you're holding a Bitcoin bag. Drop your Bitcoin wallet account in every post to receive Love Cash Money.

AI Assistant

CANDY.ARVRTISE

The Wizard of Hahz name this solution after his wife who knows it all, subscribe as an A-Team tribe to receive a key to unlock candy.arvrtise.com to use 300+ AI assistants. This AI solution helps unfunded businesses with a lack of staff.

Bitcoin Amazon

MARKET.ARVRTISE

Arvrtise Market is the Bitcoin Amazon with zero middleman fees, allowing sellers to receive Bitcoin Sats for their digital or physical services and products worldwide. Sellers can communicate with buyers in their branded Arvrtise Discord or Metaverse.

Web Development

WE BUILD THAT

We accept Bitcoin Love Cash Money, Bitcoin Sats and fiat to build custom websites, marketplaces, or AI platforms. We also build braneded AR Effects on TikTok and Instagram Arvrtising campaigns. Arvrtise is the top 5% TikTok effects creators in the world.

Meme Marketing

COOL VIDS

We create captivating videos that amplify your business with 1-of-1 short reel meme marketing ads that Gen Zers will repost. Launch a CapCut social media campaign that pays your tribe for reposting your content.

Arvrtise Discord

LEADERBOARD

Our Arvrtise Discord leaderboard enables our A-Team tribe to discover the best services and products online. Active users earn XR points for every post and receive additional points for donations, helping them become the #1 Arvrtiser in their industry.

Farcaster Ads

ADS.ARVRTISE

We developed a Farcaster app ad protocol that allows you to create a DIY ad campaign that pays everyone who promotes your business with a simple straight forward payment process that pays your Base wallet directly.

Portal

Portal to one of your many Arvrtise subdomains and $RNT a spot below to promote your website or Arvrtise channel.
